minimal.label: Has minimal value
minimal.sql_template: to_numeric_immutable({property}) IS NOT NULL AND to_numeric_immutable({property}) >= {value}

maximum.label: Has maximum value
maximum.sql_template: to_numeric_immutable({property}) IS NOT NULL AND to_numeric_immutable({property}) <= {value}

minimal_date.label: Has minimal date
minimal_date.sql_template: to_date_immutable({property}, {format}) IS NOT NULL AND to_date_immutable({property}, {format}) >= to_date_immutable({value}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
minimal_date.help_text: Use the format YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM or YYYY for year/month/day, year/month and year respectively

maximum_date.label: Has maximum date
maximum_date.sql_template: to_date_immutable({property}, {format}) IS NOT NULL AND to_date_immutable({property}, {format}) <= to_date_immutable({value}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
maximum_date.help_text: Use the format YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM or YYYY for year/month/day, year/month and year respectively
